results.title: Simvastatin modulates cellular components in influenza A virus-infected cells
results.text_hl: In this study, the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Influenza_Human</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007251 @@@influenza A-infected@@@ cells was investigated.

results.title: Rhabdomyolysis with acute renal failure triggered by the seasonal flu vaccination in a patient taking simvastatin.
